mapper.delete: DELETE FROM glamp_favorite WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND glamp_id = #{glampId}
mapper.select: SELECT glamp_id AS glampId, glamp_image AS glampImage, glamp_name AS glampName, star_point_avg AS starPointAvg, glamp_location AS glampLocation, glamp_intro AS glampIntro, info_basic AS infoBasic, traffic AS traffic, info_notice AS infoNotice, activate_status AS activateStatus FROM glamping WHERE glamp_id = #{glampId}

SELECT A.glamp_id, A.room_name AS roomName,
C.weekday_price AS roomPrice,
C.weekend_price AS roomPrice,
C.peak_weekday_price AS roomPrice,
C.peak_weekend_price AS roomPrice,
A.room_id AS roomId, A.room_num_people AS roomNumPeople, A.room_max_people AS roomMaxPeople, A.check_in_time AS checkInTime, A.check_out_time AS checkOutTime, B.room_image_name AS pic, D.extra_charge AS extraCharge FROM room A INNER JOIN room_image B ON A.room_id = B.room_id INNER JOIN room_price C ON A.room_id = C.room_id INNER JOIN glamping D ON A.glamp_id = D.glamp_id GROUP BY A.room_id HAVING A.glamp_id = #{glampId}
SELECT room_id AS roomId, room_name AS roomName FROM room WHERE glamp_id = #{glampId}

SELECT B.roomId AS roomId, B.roomName AS roomName, A.room_image_name AS roomImages FROM room_image A INNER JOIN (SELECT room_id AS roomId, room_name AS roomName FROM room WHERE glamp_id = #{glampId}) B ON A.room_id = B.roomId ORDER BY roomId
SELECT B.user_nickname AS userNickName, A.review_content AS content FROM review A INNER JOIN user B ON A.user_id = B.user_id WHERE glamp_id = #{glampId} ORDER BY A.created_at DESC LIMIT 7;

SELECT D.room_name AS roomName, A.review_id AS reviewId, A.glamp_id AS glampId, B.user_profile_image AS userProfileImage, B.user_nickname AS userNickName, A.review_star_point AS starPoint, A.created_at AS createdAt, A.review_content AS userReviewContent, A.review_comment AS ownerReviewContent FROM review A INNER JOIN user B ON A.user_id = B.user_id INNER JOIN reservation_complete C ON A.reservation_id = C.reservation_id INNER JOIN room D ON C.room_id = D.room_id WHERE A.glamp_id = #{glampId} ORDER BY A.created_at DESC LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{size}
SELECT A.review_image_name FROM review_image A INNER JOIN review B ON A.review_id = B.review_id WHERE glamp_id = #{glampId} LIMIT 9
SELECT service_title FROM service WHERE service_id IN ( SELECT service_id FROM room_service WHERE room_id = #{roomId} )

SELECT A.room_id FROM room A JOIN room_service B ON A.room_id = B.room_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT room_id FROM reservation_before WHERE (#{outDate} > check_in_date AND check_out_date > #{inDate} ) ) C ON A.room_id = C.room_id
JOIN ( SELECT A.glamp_id FROM room A JOIN room_service B ON A.room_id = B.room_id WHERE B.service_id IN
#{filterId}
GROUP BY A.glamp_id HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT B.service_id) = #{filterSize} ) D ON A.glamp_id = D.glamp_id
WHERE C.room_id IS NULL AND (#{people} >= A.room_num_people AND A.room_max_people >= #{people})
GROUP BY A.glamp_id
